\begin{enumerate}

\item Calcula las siguientes derivadas de los órdenes indicados:

\begin{multicols}{2}
\begin{enumerate}

\item $D^4[\frac{3}{x+2}]$

\item $D^3[\sqrt{4-2x}]$

\item $D^3[\frac{2}{\sqrt{x}}]$

\item $D^4[\frac{4}{3x^2+2}]$

\item $D^5[-1\frac{1}{5}x^{-5}+\frac{1}{7}x^3]$

\item $D^5[\frac{1}{x^2}+\frac{2}{3x^4}]$

\item $D^2[\frac{\sqrt{2}}{3}(x^3-x^9)]$

\item $D^3[\frac{x^3-8}{x^3+8}]$

\item $D^2[\frac{7x+6}{4x+7}\left(\frac{3x}{2}+1\right)]$

\item $D^5[\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}\left(x^5-2x^4+3x^4-4x^2+5x-\frac{1}{x}\right)]$

\end{enumerate}
\end{multicols}


\end{enumerate}
